repo_notes.content: Whisper AI is a voice-first AI pair-programmer.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce Whisper-AI as a voice-first AI pair programming system, explaining its high-level purpose, key features, and the three main architectural components (Web Frontend, CLI Watcher, Cloudflare Backend)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through initial setup, including npx command execution, CLI installation, and first-time connection between web frontend and local environment

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Provide a comprehensive overview of the system architecture, including the monorepo structure, three-tier design, and how components interact

pages.title: Monorepo Structure
pages.purpose: Detail the monorepo organization using Turborepo and pnpm, explaining workspaces, shared packages, and dependency management

pages.title: Connection Handshake System
pages.purpose: Explain the token-based two-way handshake mechanism that connects the web frontend with the CLI watcher, including token lifecycle and session establishment

pages.title: Web Frontend (apps/web)
pages.purpose: Overview of the Next.js web application, its role as 'The Voice', and key responsibilities including connection management and meeting interface

pages.title: Connection Flow and Dashboard
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the ConnectionPanel component, useConnection hook, and the dashboard's role in managing token generation, CLI connection, and meeting creation

pages.title: Meeting Interface
pages.purpose: Explain the meeting page component, participant authentication, and integration with Cloudflare RealtimeKit for voice sessions

pages.title: Frontend Configuration
pages.purpose: Document the TypeScript configuration, dependencies (Radix UI, RealtimeKit React), and build setup for the web application

pages.title: CLI Watcher (apps/watcher)
pages.purpose: Overview of the CLI application built with Oclif, its role as 'The Eyes', and how it monitors and syncs local codebase changes

pages.title: Monitor Command and File Watching
pages.purpose: Explain the monitor command implementation, FileWatcher component, and how chokidar tracks file system changes with ignore patterns and stability thresholds

pages.title: File Synchronization Pipeline
pages.purpose: Detail the FileSyncer component, batch processing, retry logic, and how file changes are transmitted to the backend with error handling

pages.title: CLI Development Setup
pages.purpose: Explain the dual entry points (dev.js vs run.js), TypeScript configuration with ts-node, and Oclif CLI framework integration

pages.title: Backend (apps/backend)
pages.purpose: Overview of the Cloudflare Workers backend as 'The Brain', including its serverless architecture, Durable Objects, and key responsibilities

pages.title: Worker Configuration and Environment
pages.purpose: Document the Cloudflare Worker configuration, environment variables (API keys for Deepgram, ElevenLabs, etc.), and Durable Object bindings

pages.title: Token Management and API Routes
pages.purpose: Explain the token registration, checking, and CLI connection API endpoints, including CORS middleware and KV store usage

pages.title: Session Durable Objects
pages.purpose: Deep dive into WhisperSessionDurableObject, its lifecycle, state management, and role as the central session orchestrator

pages.title: Real-Time Voice Pipeline
pages.purpose: Explain the RealtimeAgent base class, WhisperTextProcessor, and the complete audio pipeline from WebRTC through STT, AI, and TTS

pages.title: AI Services and Context Management
pages.purpose: Document the AIService for generating responses with Llama 3, StateManagerService for persistence, and how project context is built and maintained

pages.title: Meeting and Session Routes
pages.purpose: Detail the API routes for creating meetings, participants, and managing session initialization/deinitialization with Cloudflare Realtime API

pages.title: File Sync Backend Processing
pages.purpose: Explain how the backend receives and processes file synchronization requests, updating Durable Object state and managing file metadata

pages.title: Shared Packages
pages.purpose: Overview of internal shared packages that promote code reuse across applications, including types, UI components, and configuration

pages.title: Shared Types (packages/shared)
pages.purpose: Document the common TypeScript types and interfaces used across applications, including syncFileRequestBody, ConversationMessage, and ProjectContext

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Practical guide for developers working on Whisper-AI, including setup, configuration, and development workflows

pages.title: Code Quality and Formatting
pages.purpose: Explain the Prettier configuration, ESLint setup, and TypeScript strict mode settings used across the monorepo

pages.title: Build and Deployment
pages.purpose: Document the build process using Turborepo, Wrangler deployment for Cloudflare Workers, and Next.js build configuration
